title: The Walking Dead: Dead City Subverts Expectations in Season 2 Teaser: ‘You’re In for a Bit of a Shock’
description: In the Season 2 teaser for The Walking Dead: Dead City that AMC dropped Friday during the show’s New York Comic-Con panel, Jeffrey Dean Morgan’s Negan is ready to light it up — literally. “Power,” he intones, “equals power.” And just like that, Manhattan springs back to life! Elsewhere in the clip, Lauren Cohan’s Maggie […]
author: Charlie Mason
excerpt: The Season 2 trailer for 'The Walking Dead: Dead City' is nothing short of electrifying. Take a peek, and you'll understand why.
text: In the Season 2 teaser for The Walking Dead: Dead City that AMC dropped Friday during the show’s New York Comic-Con panel, Jeffrey Dean Morgan’s Negan is ready to light it up — literally. “Power,” he intones, “equals power.” And just like that, Manhattan springs back to life! Elsewhere in the clip, Lauren Cohan’s Maggie questions why her frenemy is all of a sudden so keen on resurrecting the Big Apple. “I guess you’re in for a bit of a shock” is the apparent reply. Presumably, Maggie will be the last to find out that her husband’s killer has only turned evil again in order to keep her son Hershel from losing more than a toe to the villainous Dama. (More on that here.) Per the official logline for Season 2, which premieres on AMC in spring 2025: “The Walking Dead: Dead City follows fan-favorite characters Maggie and Negan as they travel into a post-apocalyptic Manhattan, long ago cut off from the mainland. The crumbling city is filled with the dead and denizens who have made New York City their own world full of anarchy, danger, beauty and terror.  Every Walking Dead Series, Ranked “In Season 2, in the growing war for control of Manhattan, Maggie and Negan find themselves trapped on opposite sides. As their paths intertwine, they come to see that the way out for both is more complicated and harrowing than they ever imagined.” Press PLAY on the video above to check out the teaser and get a peek at new cast member Kim Coates (Sons of Anarchy) in action.
html:
In the Season 2 teaser for The Walking Dead: Dead City that AMC dropped Friday during the show’s New York Comic-Con panel, Jeffrey Dean Morgan’s Negan is ready to light it up — literally. “Power,” he intones, “equals power.” And just like that, Manhattan springs back to life!

Elsewhere in the clip, Lauren Cohan’s Maggie questions why her frenemy is all of a sudden so keen on resurrecting the Big Apple. “I guess you’re in for a bit of a shock” is the apparent reply. Presumably, Maggie will be the last to find out that her husband’s killer has only turned evil again in order to keep her son Hershel from losing more than a toe to the villainous Dama. (More on that here.)

Per the official logline for Season 2, which premieres on AMC in spring 2025: “The Walking Dead: Dead City follows fan-favorite characters Maggie and Negan as they travel into a post-apocalyptic Manhattan, long ago cut off from the mainland. The crumbling city is filled with the dead and denizens who have made New York City their own world full of anarchy, danger, beauty and terror. 

Every Walking Dead Series, Ranked

“In Season 2, in the growing war for control of Manhattan, Maggie and Negan find themselves trapped on opposite sides. As their paths intertwine, they come to see that the way out for both is more complicated and harrowing than they ever imagined.”

Press PLAY on the video above to check out the teaser and get a peek at new cast member Kim Coates (Sons of Anarchy) in action.
